I've noticed that a surface site density can be specified in the cti
file for an interface.  Does anyone know of a method accessible to
the 'interface' class that can output this site density in MATLAB? 
 
I'd like to just use the interface object to store it, rather than
creating some external structure.

Much thanks,
Steven DeCaluwe
